tag_list: angel-investor, private-equity, global-business-strategy, social-media, viral-marketing, entrepreneur
overview:
Abi is little known in public circles and conversation but has proven to be among many listed “Shakers & Movers” periodically for the past 7 years.

Currently the Entrepreneur in Residence for one of Australia’s leading private equity firms, Archer Capital, with $3 billion in funds under management. (http://www.archercapital.com.au)

Mr. Geburah’s was recently cited for his personal 1.5M investment in Mobile Music Content Company Jukebox SMS (http://www.jukeboxsms.com) which developed a “built-in digital signage system that let’s you advertise your product while your customers rock out to your awesome music.” Abi has also been credited on other various contributions including; LiveVideo, Myspace’s Co-Founder Brad Greenspan’s Youtube rival as well as having consulted for Soundcloud eHarmony, and multiple recently disclosed disruptive Start-Ups.

At the age of 31, TechCrunch and other media outlets are just now hearing about some of the moves he has made even with the ambiguity and clout Abi Geburah seems to carry.
